text:
Starting Sept. 1, the #Texas Compassionate Use Program will include #PTSD & #cancer of all stages, allowing use of “low-#THC #cannabis,” reports @TexasTribune.

Read the findings cited from fellow @KatNeillHarris & scholar @vedwards14 on #medicalmarijuana:
https://t.co/GFHz0UdEaB https://t.co/eUXX2jexux
